a.strong: Adele Harrison Middle School Principal Hiring Plan
Sonoma Valley Unified receives SAFE Sonoma Valley (Supportive, Achievement-based, & Flexible Environments) Grant
Public Information meeting on the SVHS Athletic Field project will also be a Special Board meeting. This will allow our trustees to attend the meeting.

br.br: A Special Board Meeting of SVUSD Board of Trustees will be held Oct 15th at 5:30 at the high schools College & Career Center. The meeting will have a single agenda item, a public information meeting to provide an overview of the athletic field project and the Draft EIR.[ Click here ]

p.strong: In response to the Governors Executive Order N-29-20 Further Revising Teleconferencing of Board Meetings, all Board Meetings areclosed to in-person participation by the public the public can still view the meeting live and comment electronically either prior to or during the meeting as described in more detail below:

li.strong: Meeting Agendas are posted online here.
SVUSD Board Meetings are live-streamed via sonomatv.org and recordings posted on YouTube.
Members of the public are encouraged to submit public comments via the following: Public Comments for Board Meetings.
All public comments are collected up to and during the meeting and will be shared during the appropriate section of the meeting.
If you are unable to submit your public comments via the online survey, please email them directly to boardmeetingcomment@sonomaschools.org.

span.p: En respuesta a la Orden ejecutiva del gobernador N-29-20 Revisin adicional de teleconferencias de las reuniones de la Junta, todas las reuniones de la Junta estn cerradas a la participacin en persona del pblico: el pblico an puede ver la reunin en vivo y comentar electrnicamente antes o durante el reunin como se describe con ms detalle a continuacin:

li.strong: Las agendas de reuniones se publican en lnea aqu.
Las reuniones de la Junta de SVUSD se transmiten en vivo a travs de sonomatv.org y las grabaciones se publican en YouTube.
Se alienta a los miembros del pblico a enviar comentarios pblicos a travs de lo siguiente: Comentarios pblicos para las reuniones de la Junta.
Todos los comentarios pblicos se recopilan hasta y durante la reunin y se compartirn durante la seccin correspondiente de la reunin.
Si no puede enviar sus comentarios pblicos a travs de la encuesta en lnea, enve un correo electrnico directamente a

span.p: Non-Discrimination Statement Sonoma Valley Unified School District programs, activities, and practices shall be free from unlawful discrimination, harassment, intimidation, and bullying based on actual or perceived ancestry, race, color, nationality, national origin, immigration status, ethnic group identification, age, religion, marital or parental status, pregnancy, physical or mental disability, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, or gender expression, or genetic information; or on the basis of a persons association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics. If you believe you have been subjected to discrimination, harassment, intimidation, or bullying, you should immediately contact the school site principal and/or Director of Human Resources (CCR Title 5 and Title IX Officer), Andrew Ryan at 707-935-6008 or aryan@sonomaschools.org. Copies of SVUSDs uniform complaint procedures policy (1312.3) and SVUSDs non-discrimination/harassment policy (5145.3) are available upon request. Declaracin de No-Discriminacin en SVUSD Los programas, actividades y prcticas del Distrito Escolar Unificado del Valle de Sonoma estarn libres de discriminacin ilegal, acoso, e intimidacin en base a los antecedentes actuales o percibidos, raza, color, nacionalidad, origen nacional, estatus migratorio, identificacin con un grupo tnico, edad, religin, estado civil o parental, embarazo, discapacidad fsica o mental, gnero, orientacin sexual, identidad de gnero, o expresin de gnero, o informacin gentica; en la base de la asociacin de una persona con una persona o grupo con una o ms de estas caractersticas actuales o percibidas. Si usted cree que usted ha sido sujeto a discriminacin, acoso, o intimidacin, usted debera contactar inmediatamente al director del plantel y/o Director de Recursos Humanos (CCR Titulo 5 y Oficial de Titulo IX), Andrew Ryan al 707-935-6008 o aryan@sonomaschools.org. Las copias de la poltica de procedimientos de quejas uniformes en SVUSD (1312.3) y la poltica de discriminacin/acoso (5145.3) en SVUSD estn disponibles cuando lo solicitan.

div.div: SVUSD Non-Discrimination Statement: The Sonoma Valley Unified School District prohibits, at any district school or school activity, discrimination, harassment, including sexual harassment, intimidation, and bullying, based on actual or perceived race, color, ancestry, nationality, national origin, immigration status, ethnic group identification, ethnicity, age, religion, marital status, pregnancy, parental status, physical or mental disability, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, or genetic information, or association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics. This shall apply when applicable, to interns, volunteers, and job applicants. For questions, concerns or complaints, please contact District Equity and Title IX Compliance Officer: Jonathan Ferrer HR; 17850 Railroad Avenue, Sonoma, CA 95476, DirectorHR @sonomaschools.org, 707-935-6008
